channel.title: One Clicking Summer Garden
channel.description:
I thought this was pretty interesting. I only learned about it last night, and it takes maybe an hour of practice to get good at it. It's anywhere from 150-180k thieving exp p/h, which isn't as good as pyramid plunder, but you can store the exp in your bank to get it all at once.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fvHyuubs1S0
For those of you who don't know, you're usually kicked out when you run past the elemental things...

item.title: One Clicking Summer Garden
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Spam 4 and 6 whilst left clicking, it’s easy once you’ve gotten used to it

It’s more of an impulse sort of thing(I fletch a lot), which is why I randomly do it all around the screen for clicking from time to time, also for using the fruits on the pestle & mortar

Read full topic

item.title: One Clicking Summer Garden
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Errr it seems it does that wayyyy too fast to be mouse keys…

Read full topic

item.title: One Clicking Summer Garden
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Here’s the video of me doing it without fletching anyways.

eczema3:

It’s definitely an auto clicker, or some kind of bot, you can see it in the way he pauses before he actually goes in to do the run, it sits there fletching a few bolts before he realises he’s not running stop the clicker, runs, and then starts the auto clicker again.

And no, that’s me timing it correctly. lol

You can’t just run at any time. There’s only one chance every ~35 seconds(one rotation of the elementals)

Read full topic

item.title: One Clicking Summer Garden
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

It’s definitely an auto clicker, or some kind of bot, you can see it in the way he pauses before he actually goes in to do the run, it sits there fletching a few bolts before he realises he’s not running stop the clicker, runs, and then starts the auto clicker again.

item.title: One Clicking Summer Garden
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

No, it’s not caused by the fletching. The fletching is just so that exp isn’t lost while constantly running through there. It can be done just as easily without fletching. There is no action being done to prevent them from attacking, it’s just good timing.

  • it’s not an autoclicker it’s mousekeys + a mouse

Read full topic

item.title: One Clicking Summer Garden
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:8, topic:384302”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=480063.msg3515697#msg3515697 date=1298958022]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=480063.msg3515610#msg3515610 date=1298949709]

[quote author=BloodRayne link=topic=480063.msg3515562#msg3515562 date=1298946714]
No, not a stall, just takes setting up and good timing lol
[/quote]Do you not realize what a stall is?
[/quote]I don’t in this case; enlighten me/us?
[/quote]To stall other actions from being performed by blocking them, in this case by fletching continuously.[/quote]Ah. It also seems he had an auto-clicker doing the fletching

Read full topic
